Ask HN: How to get started in quant trading?
text:
I am in my mid-20s. and have worked at late stage SF tech companies as a SWE and Data Scientist for the last 5 years. I am fairly skilled at WebDev, Algorithm Design, and Machine Learning (College level, not research).

I have always been fascinated by quick feedback loops and dynamism of financial markets and exploring a career there and have consumed a lot of literature on fundamental investing.

How do I go from here to a job as a quant trader in terms of acquiring relevant skills, lining interviews and landing a job? Any help would be great!

Ask HN: Any experience with Google TV Basic mode?
text:
Dumb TVs, or more the absence of good quality ones, seem to be a hotly debated topic on HN and over time I've seen quite a few people mention they are looking for one.

A few weeks months back I heard that Google introduce a "Basic TV Mode" on any tvs that run Google TV, mind this isnt Android TV. There seems to be very little information on it online besides some websites mentioning it a year back. So far Sony and TCL seem to be the only ones providing Google TV in Europe.

Has anyone used the basic mode or has a tv with Google TV?
